name: PuwellCloud
0:
”Alexa, show the room camera.”
”Alexa, turn on the light.”
”Alexa, set the light to red.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
By working with Amazon Alexa, you can easily control Puwell-series smart home devices such as cameras, lights, switches and outlets by talking to Alex Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap and Echo show. 
1.Download Amazon Alexa APP, login and add your echo speaker. 
2.Tap menu-Skills, search "Puwell cloud" in the skill store. When you find it, please tap the "Enable Skill" button in the skill's detail page. 
3.After enable the skill successfully, link your Puwell account and discover your devices following the prompts. Please name your device such as "room camera", "kitchen light", "my device" and so on. 
4.Control your devices by talking to Echo speaker some simple voice commands. 
Here are some samples:
（1）turn on / off your smart home device(excludes smart home cameras)
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen light."
"Alexa, turn off the kitchen light."
（2）Set the brightness (for compatible lights)
"Alexa, set the kitchen light to 50 percent."
"Alexa, dim the kitchen light by 10 percent." 
（3）Set the color and shades of white (for compatible lights)
"Alexa, set the kitchen light to red."
"Alexa, set the kitchen light daylight."
"Alexa, make the kitchen light cooler." 
"Alexa, make the kitchen light warmer."
（4）Show your smart home device camera feed
"Alexa, show the room camera."

Note: If you rename your device in Puwell APP, you need to discover the device again, otherwise you cannot control it unless you re-discover it.
